API Documentation

Comprehensive API reference for Negravis Oracle services with real-time data and blockchain integration

Endpoints

Quick Links

AuthenticationRate LimitsWebhooks
POST/api/oracle-manager/query

Oracle Query

Execute queries across multiple Oracle providers with consensus algorithms

Parameters

providerrequiredstring

Oracle provider (chainlink, coingecko, weather, nasa, wikipedia)

queryrequiredstring

Query string or symbol

userIdoptionalstring

User identifier for tracking

Example Request

Terminal
curl -X POST "https://negravis-app.vercel.app/api/oracle-manager/query" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "provider": "chainlink",
    "query": "BTC",
    "userId": "user123"
  }'

Example Response

JSON Response
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "query": "BTC",
    "result": "Sample result data",
    "confidence": 0.95,
    "consensus_method": "weighted_average",
    "sources": [
      "chainlink",
      "coingecko"
    ],
    "timestamp": 1754596580389,
    "execution_time_ms": 245
  },
  "blockchain": {
    "transaction_id": "0.0.12345@1704067200.123456789",
    "hash": "0xa1b2c3d4e5f6...",
    "network": "hedera-testnet",
    "verified": true,
    "explorer_link": "https://hashscan.io/testnet/transaction/..."
  }
}

Authentication

Currently, the API is open for testing. In production, API keys will be required.

Coming Soon: API key authentication and rate limiting

Rate Limits

Requests per minute:60
Requests per hour:1,000
Concurrent requests:10
